name: Gobang Let's Go
description:
Gobang (Gomoku or Five in a Row) is a classic strategy board game. The goal is to make a line of five stones in any direction.

  • Stunning Zen style Gobang set and beautiful environment
  • World class AI with 8 difficulty levels, suits for both beginners and advanced players.
  • Intuitive local and online multiplayer with ELO ranking system
  • Demonstrate your skills in 40 carefully selected challenges
  • Includes both standard and Renju rules
  • Online ranked games and leaderboards
